attributes.action: MPs to nominate Conservative MEP Daniel Hannan as Brexit Prime Minister
attributes.background: Judging by his pre-referendum speech at Oxford Union Society, this is the man who should sort out negotiations & terms for Great Britain leaving the European Union. Currently on the verge of loosing his job as an MEP & happy do so, he is fit for this purpose. What a fabulous man

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
